name: Last Phone
description:
UPDATE
Last Phone post jam.7z
new version of the game with few bug fixes and all players can play on the keyboard:
AWD
arrows
JIL
153 on the numpad

Hope you enjoy it

Game is about 4 people fighting for the last phone. 

Society is controlled by the technology - the Machine. All people are victims of the marketing, everybody wants the phone. And if you hold phone long enough, you’ll win the game…..and lose yourself

Contrast between addiction to technology theme and fast and fun gameplay makes our game interesting. You can see subtle hints about unpleasant world in everything in the game. Our goal was to make really fun multiplayer game with deeper theme that can speak to the people.
